summary: Follows a scrappy group of commodities traders as they try to make a living trading coffee on the New York Board of Trade before electronic trading threatens to make their way of life obsolete.
cast: Richard Sylla|Joseph Digiso|Jon Stefanick|Sean Walter|Jon Horowitz|Steve Rizzo|Paul Sealock|Aaron Lucchetti|Rich Blake|Dave Martin|Jeanette Young|Paul Digiso|George Rizzo|Scott Adams|Alex Plonski|Fred Schoenhut|Rita Brieger|Nathan Butera|Edward Delaney|Joe Digiso Jr.|Robert Digiso|Kevin Flaherty|Joe Greco Jr.|Joe Greco Sr.|Gene McFadden|Michael Singer|Stephanie Singer|Scott Stern|Elizabeth Walter|Mark Jawdoszyn
title: The Pit
